code: @Test public void testAggregateExpressionSize() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:aggregated").expectedBodiesReceived("A+B+C").     getMockEndpoint("mock:aggregated").expectedPropertyReceived(Exchange.AGGREGATED_COMPLETED_BY, "timeout").     Map<String, Object> headers = new HashMap<>().     headers.put("id", 123).     headers.put("mySize", 4).     template.sendBodyAndHeaders("direct:start", "A", headers).     template.sendBodyAndHeaders("direct:start", "B", headers).     template.sendBodyAndHeaders("direct:start", "C", headers).     // do not send the 4th as we want to test for timeout then     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").aggregate(header("id"), new BodyInAggregatingStrategy()).completionSize(2).completionSize(header("mySize")).completionTimeout(1000).to("mock:aggregated"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").aggregate(header("id"), new BodyInAggregatingStrategy()).completionSize(2).completionSize(header("mySize")).completionTimeout(1000).to("mock:aggregated").         }     }. }
